root.name: Zen: Intergalactic Ninja
root.description: Zen, the game's protagonist, can attack enemies with his energy staff. Either with his basic attack, or can charge up his staff for a stronger attack. Zen also can perform a slide move to attack enemies and go through low areas, and can perform a kick attack in the air.Game Boy Version The Game Boy version consisted of 5 stages - four themed stages where Zen takes on Contaminous's lieutenants, Oil Slick, Sulfura, Smogger and Garbage Man, and a final boss stage where he fights Contaminous.
